lines.text: Don't give me this bullshit about Murphy's Law. If I run into Murphy, I'm gonna kick him right in the balls.
Come on, kid. Money's talking!
Well, maybe it's not talking to me.
Top of the head, hardest part of the body.
It ain't "mairzy doats and dozy doats" out there. It's war. You fight Black Death like the Marquis of Queensbury, and you're gonna be carried out in a body bag. But, hey. Good luck!
Bridgeport? You're moving in the wrong direction.
I'll catch you on the greasy side.
Now. Before you ladies get pregnant and you gentlemen murder one another you'll learn the joy of reading. This way, you have something to do in your ninth month or in your jail cell.
I got a pseudonym too. Spits.
That's a nickname. It has a meaning Leroy. And I hesitate to think how you got it.
It's a free country.
Would that were true, kid. Would that were true.

That's too bad. You have a gift for language, Mr. Riley. But talent is a common thing. People waste it every day. They abuse it. They take it for granted. Success comes not from what God has given you but what you do with it. It's really up to you.
I'm not proud.
You don't say no to me boy!
No.
Did I say something?
Yeah, you said something.
Wow, that's funny. You're a comedian, huh?
I never refuse. Never refuse.
Well, he don't look like much.
He not much. He's just a funny boy.
Oh, yeah?
Yeah.
You funny, boy? Well come on. Make me laugh.
I don't want any trouble.
That's too bad, funny boy. See, trouble be my middle name.
Trouble be his uh, pseudonym.
Anytime, nigga. Anyplace.
Well, then. Hello, time. Hello, place.
What do you know about this guy?
If he hurts you with his left, go down.
Been a pleasure meeting you.
Likewise. I guess.
You look sharp, man. How about me?
Real sharp, Romano.
You got to be a real perverse individual pass up this kind of money.
It's got a bad smell.
Gonna buy a waterbed.
I like you, Romano. You take care of yourself, huh?
Sweetheart, I know half a dozen ways to make a guy get into an automobile.
When you're weak, you act strong. And when you're strong pretend to be weak.
Poverty is a black disease.
Not just.
All I got is a broken nose and a bunch of recollections. You got recollections, boy?
Yeah. Some.
You young yet. They accumulate. Believe me.
Comeback, rematch. He punished that man. Retired him for life. No. He ain't got no weaknesses.
Don't be talking that Spanish shit ...
No use in knocking that door. Doc say he in a gang war. Bastards leave him brain-dead.
You're angry. That's what's gonna get you beat out there! Anger is your enemy!
This is the white boy I told you saved my black ass.
Appreciate that, because I love his ass.
What, are these guys gonna kill me?
I certainly hope not.
Yeah well Horn's a real scumbag.
What, you just now realize that? Tell you, the whole world's crammed full of them, my brother.
Horn wants us to kill each other. For what? So he can get rich?
Come get your money.
